name: FAT - FurAffiniTweaks
description: Some small tweaks to FurAffinity. (Dark theme only.) It mostly enhances quotes, horizontal lines, and the font. I really recommend to use it with Grey Rust, though.
additional_info: Things it changes for now: • Quote style. • Horizontal lines style. • Font size and style. (Also adds a shadow.) • Adds a blue color to Artist and Contact informations. • Adds a background to the gallery/favorite submissions on the profile. • Fixes the navigation bar on top of your screen. • Enhance the shouts a little. (On the profile.)
